Package controller

Class RequestController

java.lang.Object
controller.RequestController
public class RequestController extends Object
A controller class that acts as a "middle man" between the view classes FacultyView, FYPCoordinatorView, StudentView and the model classes Request, StudentToSupervisor, StudentToFYPCoor, FacultyToFYPCoor.

It can create, update or filter Request details.

Since:
2023-04-09
Version:
1.0

    • addStudentToFYPCoorRequest

      public static boolean addStudentToFYPCoorRequest(model.StudentToFYPCoor request, int projectID)
      Adds a request from Student to FYP Coordinator into REQUESTS and StudentREQUESTS maps.
      Parameters:
      request - The request made by the student.
      projectID - The project ID of the project requested.
      Returns:
      true if the request was successful. Otherwise, false if the request has already been made.

    • createSelectProjectRequest

      public static void createSelectProjectRequest(int projectID, String studentID)
      Creates a new request to select a project from Student to FYP Coordinator. Changes the status of the requesting student to REGISTERING.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The project ID of the project requested.
      studentID - The user ID of the student making the request.

      public static void createTransferRequest(int projectID, String supervisorID, String newSupervisorID)
      Creates a new request to transfer a project from Supervisor to FYP Coordinator.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The project ID of the project being transferred.
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor making the request.
      newSupervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor being transferred to.
